data.name: API Specifications Conference 2020
data.description: A place for API practitioners to come together and discuss the evolution of API technology including cutting edge keynotes and sessions that chart the future of APIs, in-depth specification and standards discussions and an extensive tutorial track.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day India
relatedRecords.description: AWS Community Day India 2020 is being organized by AWS User Group India. We’re united by community-led learnings and diversified by the wide variety of tools and technologies closely knit with Amazon Web Services.

relatedRecords.name: Webflow Virtual World Tour
relatedRecords.description: 3 weeks. 12 events. 9 time zones. August–September 2020. Take a trip around the world with the Webflow team, and hear from local customers and experts.
